description: Alexi Auclair is making a video for his portfolio one afternoon, when all of a sudden he gets the urge to get off. He decides to let the laptop camera run, filming the whole affair while simultaneously watching it. The whole loop has him charged in a new and exciting way, and in no time he begins playing with the camera, toying and teasing it with his ripped body, firm ass, and stiff cock, building up into a voyeuristic frenzy until he explodes all over himself.Enjoy!
title: Alexi Auclair
